topic: Man catches fire from power bank at Melbourne airport business lounge

ideas.title: Power Surge at the Paragon
ideas.premise: A businessman spontaneously combusts from a faulty power bank in the Qantas lounge, blaming it on 'dodgy Melbourne weather' while ordering another flat white.
ideas.why_funny: Stereotypical Melburnian nonchalance in the face of absurd danger.

ideas.title: The Great Power Bank Arson of '24
ideas.premise: A frazzled traveller, engulfed in flames, runs past bewildered racegoers in fascinators, screaming 'I'm late for the Melbourne Cup!'
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposition of high society event with chaotic, fiery emergency.

ideas.title: Diamond Battery Blues
ideas.premise: A quantum physicist from Quantum Brilliance tries to extinguish the flaming businessman with a super-cooled diamond, only to make the fire burn brighter.
ideas.why_funny: High-tech solution hilariously backfires, escalating the problem.

ideas.title: Waltzing Matilda on Fire
ideas.premise: A busker in the airport plays 'Waltzing Matilda' on a didgeridoo as the flaming man dances around him, convinced he's part of a flash mob.
ideas.why_funny: Australian cultural icon mixed with absurd and unexpected chaos.

ideas.title: Paul Kelly's Fiery Performance
ideas.premise: Paul Kelly, mid-performance at a surprise airport gig, mistakes the flaming man for a pyrotechnic effect and keeps singing.
ideas.why_funny: Iconic musician's obliviousness to the unfolding fiery disaster.

ranking: The Great Power Bank Arson of '24
